items.secDescrText: A sequence of ice crystals erupts from the ground around the caster, damaging enemies and leaving the ground chilled.
items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Active Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.secDescrText: Repeatedly attacks a large area in different directions. Each Vaal Reave that hits an enemy increases the area of effect. The area is reset after using another skill or after a short period without hitting anything. Only works with Daggers, Claws, and One-Handed Swords.
explicitMods: 15% more Area of Effect radius for each stage
items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.secDescrText: Discharges Endurance Charges, making the character invulnerable to physical damage for a short time, proportional to how many endurance charges were expended.
explicitMods: Additional 0.50 Seconds Base Duration per Endurance Charge
items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.secDescrText: Fires an arrow at the target destination. When the arrow lands, you are teleported to it and a clone is summoned at your old location. The clone is a minion that uses your bow and quiver.
items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Active Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, making them less resistant to lightning damage and giving them a chance to be shocked by lightning damage.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies have +10% chance to be Shocked by Lightning Damage
items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Strength's damage bonus applies to Projectile Attacks made with Supported Skills

items.secDescrText: Consumes a corpse, granting all of your minions the power to block both attacks and spells. The skill consumes other nearby corpses, increasing the duration for each corpse consumed.
explicitMods: Additional 0.50 Seconds Base Duration per extra Corpse consumed

Grants Minions +25% Chance to Block Spells

items.secDescrText: Throws a spectral copy of your melee weapon. It spirals out in a spinning attack that strikes enemies in its path.

items.secDescrText: Throws a trap that launches a ring of projectiles through the enemy that set it off, dealing lightning damage to them and subsequent targets and leaving a trail of shocking ground.

items.secDescrText: Places a mine that will teleport you to it when detonated. It covers both your escape and arrival with a cloud of smoke that blinds enemies, and gives you a temporary buff to movement speed.
explicitMods: Places a Remote Mine which uses this Skill when detonated
